description: Sarah Huckabee Sanders, the White House press secretary, deflected criticism of President Trump for mocking Christine Blasey Ford’s testimony, in which she accused Judge Brett Kavanaugh of sexual assault.
title: ‘He Was Stating Facts’: Sanders Defends Trump’s Blasey Remarks
title_page: ‘He Was Stating Facts’: Sanders Defends Trump’s Blasey Remarks - Video - NYTimes.com
